domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @BorisJohnson I never thought I'd ever hear myself agreeing with you, but since OUR President is a total dunderhead, here we are. I'm glad to see that your own experience with COVID-19 and being lucky to have survived it has taught you a valuable lesson in taking the threat more seriously!
